des: Hey Everyone! Let's start Adobe Audition. This is going to be a small series for cleaning and correcting your voice in Adobe Audition, I'm not an expert of Sound but I can tell you what steps I take to clean my voice for my videos.   In this tutorial you will learn how you can bring your voice from premiere to audition. Then you will learn a bit about audio compression and normalize. Then finally how to remove noise from audio.
title: How to make your VOICE / Audio better in Adobe Audition

des: Hey Everyone, Let's Equalize your Audio. So in this class I'll be doing same process as previous class and then I'll be using Equalization on the voice.
title: How to Equalize your Audio in Adobe Audition

des: Hey Everyone! Learn how I do Voice Over. In this class you will learn some tips about recording your voice in a better way for voice over and finally How to correct voice that you have recorded.   Poetry in this video is by Naz Khailvi Original Qawali sung by Ustaad Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan Voiceover by Imran Ali Dina
title: How to do Voice Over Edit in Adobe Audition

des: Hello and Welcome to Adobe Illustrator Complete Course in Urdu / Hindi. In this video you will learn basics of Adobe Illustrator, I will be teaching basic workspace and using the Selection Tool on basic shapes, Copying objects and simple pattern.
title: Adobe Illustrator Training - Class 1

des: Hello and Welcome to Adobe Illustrator Complete Course in Urdu / Hindi, also with English subtitles. In this video you will learn to use Direct Selection tool and then we will be modifying shapes and creating some simple objects.
title: Adobe Illustrator Training - Class 2

des: Hello and Welcome to Adobe Illustrator Complete Course in Urdu / Hindi. In this video you will learn how to use a pen tool and then we will make some simple objects with the help of the Pen Tool.
title: Adobe Illustrator Training - Class 3

des: Hello and Welcome to Adobe Illustrator Complete Course in Urdu / Hindi. In this video you will learn how to trace using Pen tool and also how to use Shape Builder Tool to cut shapes. We will trace a logo of Memphis Grizzlies, which I downloaded from the link below.
title: Adobe Illustrator Training - Class 4 - Pen Tool and Shape Builder Tool

des: Hello and Welcome to Adobe Illustrator Complete Course in Urdu / Hindi, also with English subtitles. In this video you will learn all about strokes in illustrator artwork. There are many details usually people ignore about strokes. I am trying to clear all those options to all my beginner students. I hope these will help you all for better understanding of drawing with strokes. Also in this class I will show you how to use Pencil tool, smooth too, path eraser tool, shaper tool, eraser tool, scissors tool and Knife tool.
title: Adobe Illustrator Training - Class 5 - All About Strokes Urdu

des: In this first class I will be giving an introduction to Photoshop Interface. You will also learn how to take a new file and what about those options for the new file. After that I will guide you about basic selections using Rectangular Marquee and Elliptical Marquee tool. You will also learn the importance of Layers in Photoshop.   If you want to share your artwork and discuss the Facebook GFXMentor - Community Group.
title: Basic Selections - Adobe Photoshop for Beginners - Class 1
